MAXIMILLIAN.name: MAXIMILLIAN
MAXIMILLIAN.descriptionLong: Maximillian Volunteer has a formidible chin which is hidden by the fish biting his head.

MOREAU.name: MOREAU
MOREAU.descriptionLong: Marcel Moreau used to work in a warehouse as the lead box-counter.

ROCLAIRE.name: ROCLAIRE
ROCLAIRE.descriptionLong: If the wooden bucket on Roclaire's head is removed, she will die.

TAKANORI.name: TAKANORI
TAKANORI.descriptionLong: Takanori smokes a pack of cigarettes every day.

TELEMACHUS.name: TELEMACHUS
TELEMACHUS.descriptionLong: Telemachus is a submarine with a man-shaped ventral extension.

WANDA.name: WANDA
WANDA.descriptionLong: Wanda is the last surviving bottlenose dolphin.

MOREAU_PARTY.name: MOREAU_PARTY
MOREAU_PARTY.descriptionLong: Moreau is always the life of the party.
